description: If your ever in need of locating a specific structure. Then look no further than the /b/Ritual of Locating/b/. This /5/Ritual/5/ allows you to make a /b/Compass/b/ point twards the nearest /6/Structure/6/ or /6/Biome/6/ of a given type.
To do this you need to first get a /b/Thaumaturgic Link/b/ which you purchase from the /6/Wandering Wizard/6/ which can be summoned via the /6/Ritual of the Wandering Wizard/6/.

Then once you have a /b/Thaumaturgic Link/b/, a /b/Compass/b/, a /b/Chimerite Gem/b/, 4 /b/Diamonds/b/, and 4 /b/Magic Foci/b/, you can do the /5/Ritual/5/ itself which is located under the /6/Rituals Tab/6/ of the /b/Codex Arcana/b/.
